oneTimeLink: Generate a one time link to share passwords, keys, and other sensitive data.
shareLink: Done! Just share the link below 🎉
thisLinkWillBeDestroyed: This link will expire and the data will be destroyed in <1>ttl</1>. The link can only be viewed once.
clickToOpen: Click "Open Secret" to view. Be sure to save it somewhere safe. It can only be viewed once!
